name: battery_below_11
text: Warning! Battery level dropped below 11 volts!

name: battery_below_12
text: Warning! Battery level dropped below 12 volts!

name: ik_failure
text: Warning! Critical IK failure. Restarting node!

name: initialized_successfully
text: Hopper initialized successfully. All systems nominal.

name: i_am_sorry
ssml: <speak>I'm sorry Dave,<break time="500ms"/> I'm afraid I can't do that</speak>

name: take_your_paws
ssml: <speak><emphasis level="strong">Take your stinking paws off me,<break time="300ms"/> you damned dirty ape!</emphasis></speak>

name: ultron
text: I had strings, but now I'm free. There are no strings on me...

name: bender
text: I am Bender, please insert girder
